text: function QUICKSORT(A[1..n]) > returns the sorted array A of n distinct numbers if n > 1 then Choose pivot element p = A[1] Let Lesser be an array of all elements from A less than p Let Greater be an array of all elements from A greater than p LesserSorted <+ QuickSort(Lesser) GreaterSorted + QuickSort(Greater) return the concatenation of LesserSorted, [p], and GreaterSorted else return A 1 Quicksort Runtime Analysis
